amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to consult with local jurisdictions adjacent to public housing authorities when negotiating any settlement of litigation regarding public housing or rental assistance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to direct the Secretary of HUD to consult with affected local governments and local housing and management authorities when negotiating any settlement of litigation regarding public housing or rental assistance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cardin amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
